author: sky.cactus
content: In the abstract, probably would be good to specify that it is a `secp256k1` signature rather than the much more vague `ECDSA` signature. <@689161464829050960>

author: sky.cactus
content: It may be worth adding to the `Motivation` section the use case of "approve and call" and replacing the "permit" design common in many newer tokens with a generalized layer 1 solution.
